"}]}]}], "exclusions": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}], "detailedDescription_md": "In pursuance of the Persons with Disability Act, 1995 (now replaced by the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act,2016), the Social Welfare Department, Assam has been taking various welfare schemes for Persons with Disabilities (PwDs) with a view to empower them so that they could cope with in various fields with their unique abilities. As such, the &quot;Deen Dayal Divyangjan Pension Scheme&quot; has been undertaken during 2018-19 which has been considered to be one of the most beneficial schemes under the Social Welfare Department, Assam.
